headline: Will Strong October Inflows and India Divestment Shift Invesco's (IVZ) Investment Narrative?
summary: Invesco Ltd. recently reported its preliminary assets under management as of October 31, 2025, totaling US$2,166.6 billion, up 2.0% from September, highlighting net long-term inflows of US$8.0 billion and money market net inflows of US$11.1 billion, alongside the sale of its majority interest in its India asset management business, which reduced AUM by US$15.6 billion. This update underscores Invesco’s ability to attract strong inflows and offset major asset sales, pointing to ongoing...
